sec.label: C.2.1
sec.title: General
sec.p: Before carrying out any measurement, the engine and the hydraulic system of the rigs shall be brought to their normal working temperature following the instruction of the manufacturer, and all relevant safety-related procedures given in the instruction book shall be carried out.
The measurement time shall not be less than 15 s.
The operating conditions during noise tests shall be identical for the determination of both the sound power level and emission sound pressure levels at operator’s positions.
